extDescription.message: Ka atɛchment a na ɛka kan no ho kɔ email mmuae mu otomatik.

optionsTitle.message: Bu mmuae ka atɛchment ho — Nhyehyɛe

uiNoOptions.message: Seisei de, nhyehyɛe biara nni hɔ a wobɛtumi asi.

uiSupport.message: Wopɛ saa add-on yi? Boa me de akyɛde ketewa bi:

uiGithubText.message: Sɛ wopɛ sɛ woka mfomso ho amanneɛ anaa nsɛmmisa foforo a, mesrɛ wo, kɔ me

iconAlt.message: Bu mmuae ka atɛchment ho ikɔn

uiBlacklistHelp.message: Fael biara a ne din hyia pɛtin yi biara no, wɔrenka ho otomatik da. Kyerɛ pɛtin baako wɔ lain biara so. Mfatoho: *.png, smime.*, *.p7s

uiWarnBlacklistLabel.message: Ka kɔkɔ sɛ blacklist ayi atɛchment bi fi mu

uiConfirmLabel.message: Bisa ansa na wobɛka atɛchment ho

uiConfirmHelp.message: Akɔmmɔbɔ ketewa bi bɛda adi kɛkɛ bere a atɛchment bɛka ho ampa. Kibɔɔd: Y anaa J = Aane; N anaa Esc = Daabi.

warnBlacklistIntro.message: Fael a ɛdidi so yi renka ho otomatik:
